actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for social security and railroad retirement taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax deduction from gross income for social security and railroad retirement taxes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for social security and railroad retirement taxes.
